trans-unit.source: Sets the per-process mode that the _WinAPI_SearchPath() function uses when locating files

trans-unit.source: The search mode to use. This parameter can be one of the following values.

trans-unit.source: If the function has been successfully called for the current process with the $BASE_SEARCH_PATH_PERMANENT flag

trans-unit.source: set, safe mode is set permanently for the calling process. Any subsequent calls to _WinAPI_SetSearchPathMode()

trans-unit.source: The _WinAPI_SetSearchPathMode() function does not modify the system registry.
